title: Devon Agrees to Buy US Shale Rival Coterra for $21.4 Billion
description: Devon Energy Corp. agreed to acquire Coterra Energy Inc. for about $21.4 billion in stock to create one of the world’s biggest shale companies as dwindling drilling sites spur producers to consolidate.
